誷字的基本解释

誷
wǎng
欺骗：“饰虚功执空文以誷主上。”

誷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǎng］
［《廣韻》文兩切，上養，微。］
欺罔。

誷字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1165第23
【廣韻】文兩切【韻會】文紡切，?音罔。誣也。【晉書·郤詵傳】朋黨則誣誷，誣誷則臧否失實，眞僞相冒。【柳宗元·登蒲州石磯詩】高歌返故室，自誷非所欣。　又與罔通。【禮·少儀】衣服在躬而不知其名，爲罔。【註】罔又作誷。　【廣韻】與?同。【類篇】作?。

誷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誷字的起名意思

暂无。

Cheer
wǎng
Deception: "Pretend to be the master with false merits and empty essays."
Cheer

[①]［wǎng］
["Guangyun" essay is divided into two parts, upper support, micro. ]
Bully.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　誷; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1165 to 23
[Guang Yun] Two cuts of text [Yunhui] Cuts of text and spinning,? Falsely also. [Book of Jin·But the Biography] The cronies make false claims, and false false claims are false and false. 【Liu Zongyuan·Deng Puzhou Shiji Poem】Going back to the home room with high praises is unpleasant.　It's connected with the same again. [Rite·Shaoyi] The clothes are bowed without knowing the name, they are illegitimate. [Note] Nian replied again.　【Guangyun】Same as? 【Classes】For?.
